desc: Stay Dry & Feel Fly! Noble Titan's underwear is patent powered by ElastaFuse Technology (EFT). EFT is an innovative trim that combines the soft and sweat absorbing properties of a sweatband with the functionality of elastic to create a revolutionary band that captures sweat, prevents chafing, and maximizes comfort.

layout.text:
Look how good.  Feel how soft.
  Revolutionary Underwear, Activewear and Accessories
